title: GUILTY GEAR Xrd -REVELATOR-
notes: Has frame rate issues. Keeps going up and down. Sound is a bit low. Otherwise it runs fine, no glitches.

title: Guilty Gear Xrd -Revelator-
notes: For better fullscreen performance please toggle off desktop compositor (in KDE: press alt+shift+F12). 60fps vs 30-40fps. Looks, sounds, and runs well.

title: GUILTY GEAR Xrd -REVELATOR-
notes: Video files do not play in gallery. Everything else seems to work flawlessly. Have not tried online. Works with Hori Real Arcade Pro IV Kai and Xbox 360 pad. 720p is the highest resolution all settings can be maxed out and still be 60 fps. At 1080p, Vsync and Post-Effect must be turned off for 60 fps.

title: Guilty Gear Xrd Revelator Rev2
notes: change graphics options for maximum performance
